questions: how much will it cost to fix my phone?
how much will it cost to fix my iPhone?
answers: Our prices are as follows: Screen Repair: Starting at $79, Battery Replacement: Starting at $49, Water Damage Repair: Starting at $99, Camera Repair**: Starting at $69, Charging Port Repair: Starting at $59, Speaker/Microphone Repair: Starting at $49, Button Repair: Starting at $39, Software Troubleshooting: Starting at $29
